feedback_welcome: Tell us what you liked about this portal, what you didn't. Maybe you have any ideas on how to make it better?
footer_notification: All images and videos obtained without the use of artificial intelligence
newcomer_caption: What I need is the dandelion in the spring. The bright yellow that means rebirth instead of destruction. The promise that life can go on, no matter how bad our losses. That it can be good again.
trees_caption: A tree is a support. A tree creates structure and provides protection. Its history is written in its rings.
bushes_caption: A bush is a community. It doesn't wait for the sun's favor; it creates its own environment. Its strength lies in the cohesion of its shoots.
herbs_caption: Grass is opportunity. It appears where others fail. Its strength lies in its speed and the millions of opportunities contained within its seeds.
history_caption: You can't force a plant to grow faster. You can only create the best conditions and wait patiently, enjoying the process of creation itself.
art_caption: All gardening is landscape painting. Alexander Pope.
art_article_content: The theme of the garden in art is incredibly broad and reflects changing human ideas about nature, paradise, beauty, and one's place in the world.
category_article_content: A list of all trees or shrubs or herbaceous plants.
communication_article_content: Ask questions, feedback, chat. Be in touch!
details_article_content: Information about the project, user support, collaboration, contacts.
search_article_content: Tools for searching plants by various characteristics.
message_text: Rice keeps me alive, but flowers give me a reason to stay alive.
